short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple and easy-to-use SHA1 Hash Generator extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WTM SHA1 Hash Generator is a powerful extension designed to allow users to generate SHA1 hashes conveniently from input data within their web browser. Whether you want to enhance security, verify data integrity, or perform other cryptographic tasks, this extension offers a seamless solution at your fingertips.
